content.description: The Hallway, Chandler and Monica are returning from their honeymoon.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Wait. Before we go in, I just want you to know I love you. I had a great time on our honeymoon, and I can’t wait to go in there and spend the rest of our life together.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You’re really sticking with the shell necklace huh? (Points to necklace of shells he’s wearing.)
(Joey and Phoebe burst forth from his apartment.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Hi!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey! You’re back! (Hugs and kisses all around.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hi sweetie!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Come on in!
(They grab the luggage and drag it into Joey and Rachel’s forcing Monica and Chandler to follow.)

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: So how was the honeymoon?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh, so much fun. But the best part is, we met this incredible couple on the way back.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: That was the best part? (To Chandler) Good honeymooning tiger.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: No, they were really cool. They were on their honeymoon too!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: They’re terrific, and they live right here in the city.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Yeah, can we go call them? Is it too soon to call? I wanna call.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I’m sorry, we’re just kinda excited because we finally have a couple to hang out with.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I know.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: A couple? Like two people? Like (points to himself) one (points to Phoebe), two people?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: This is different! Greg and Jenny are in a relationship.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh, Greg and Jenny yuck! (Angrily) Hi Greg, I’m Chandler this is Monica. Hi Monica, this is Jenny. Hi Jenny. Hi Greg.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Listen, they are really great. If you just got a chance…

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Y’know what? Why don’t you just give us our souvenirs and get the hell out of here?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: We really…didn’t get a chance to…

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You have got to be kidding me!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: We didn’t get anything for anyone.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hm-mm! Yeah nice necklace!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: That you can have.
{Transcriber’s Note: Tradition was broken here as there were no commercials immediately after the opening credits, just more show.}

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, Ross and Rachel are entering with the rest of the gang already inside.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hi!

content.speaker: All
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hello!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Welcome home.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: So, how was the honeymoon?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: It was great! It was great! How about you?! I mean you’re having a baby!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh! Look! I have a sonogram picture!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh great! (Shows them the picture.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Ross! It’s got your wavy black lines!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: All right, so now that Ross knows can you tell us y’know how it happened? I mean, when did it happen? How many times did it happen?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Monica! That’s not right! Start with where.
(Rachel looks at Ross and gets his approval.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Well it happened about six weeks ago, and uh I had just got home from work and Ross was already there ‘cause I guess he had been hanging out with Joey.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: You’re welcome buddy.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Yeah, thanks. (Joey nods no problem.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: And so I had a lot of work to do so Ross, nice guy that he is, offered to help me out. And then we had a little wine, we got to talking, and the next thing you know out of nowhere Ross comes on to me.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Umm that’s…that’s a little misleading.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What is?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: The lie you just told.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: That-that you came on to me?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: There’s the one!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: But you did! I mean, let’s be honest.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Yes let’s. Y’know what? Uh, it’s-it’s not important. What is important is that, is that we’re having a baby. And it’s not—Doesn’t matter who came on to who.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Whom. (Everyone looks at him shocked.) That’s right.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: You know you kissed me first.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What? What?! You were begging me to kiss you! You-you-you were sending me signals all over the place!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I was sending you signals?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Yeah!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh please. Okay, anyone in this room think that I would send Ross begging symbols, please show of hands. (Ross raises his hand and no one else.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Y’know what?! It doesn’t matter! It doesn’t matter what you believe! What matters is what happened!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay. So these signals Ross, explain this to me, ‘cause maybe I need to be more careful. I mean, am I sending you these signals right now?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Y’know what? Y’know what? Rachel, just-just drop it.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: No please, show me how I begged you!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I can show you, I have it on videotape! (Stunned silence) It’s an expression.

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, time has lapsed, Phoebe, Joey, Chandler, and Monica are sitting at the kitchen table.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: I can’t believe he taped the two of them having sex!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah! You gotta tell a girl before you tape her. Such a rookie mistake.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Y’know who has a great video camera?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Greg and Jenny?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Do you still wanna call ‘em? I wanna call ‘em.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Let’s call ‘em.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah! Ask them if they brought their friends any souvenirs!
(Monica goes over and dials their number.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hello? (Listens) Eighth street deli?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey, hang up! You get food poisoning just talkin’ to that place.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Uh sorry, wrong number. (Hangs up)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Here you go. (Shows her the number again.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hello? (Listens) (To All) It’s the deli again!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: All right! I’ll have a sandwich!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I don’t think this number’s right!
(Joey and Phoebe laugh.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: What?

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You got fake numbered.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: What?! People don’t do that!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Oh I think we do.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: They gave us a fake number? Why? Why would they do that?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I don’t know! You were a delight to talk to. You asked all those insightful, great questions.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: And you’ve never been funnier. Joke, joke, joke, you were a hoot!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Y’know what? Don’t worry about it, you still got me and Phoebe.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Excuse me, I don’t want Greg and Jenny’s rejects.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Rachel won’t talk to me! She won’t even open the door!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Hmm, I wonder why. Pervert!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Okay, listen I am not a pervert!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: That’s like the pervert motto! Yeah! Yeah! They have you raise your right hand, put your left hand down your pants, and repeat that!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Filming Rachel is not something I planned. Okay look, here’s what happened, and Joey you-you can back me up on this. All right, about-about a month and a half ago I came to you with a problem? Umm, a personal thing.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Personal thing? What personal thing? I don’t know.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: About…about sex? (Joey looks at him confused) That I hadn’t had sex in months?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah I knew what you were talkin’ about.

content.description: Joey and Rachel’s, Joey is reading a cereal box as Ross enters wearing the red sweater.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hey!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Do you have a minute? I’d like to talk to you about something I’m, I’m really uncomfortable talking about.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Sure. What? About uh, you showering with your mom?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I actually had a topic in mind! I’m, I’m kinda going through a dry spell, sex wise.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Whoa, for like months?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Five to be lying, six.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Six months? Whoa that’s rough.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Well, I mean it’s not all bad. I’m learning to appreciate the uh, smaller things in life. Like the sound of a bird and the color of the sky.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: The sky’s blue Ross and I had sex yesterday!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Please, help me! I have a date tonight. It has to go well okay—I’m scared for my health!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Okay. Okay. Umm…Ooh! Oh-oh, I got something. It’s this story I came up with, very romantic. I swear any woman that hears it; they’re like putty.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Really? Well then tell it to me.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Okay. Now you’re gonna want to have sex with me when you hear it, but you have to remember it is just the story.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I’ll try to control myself.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Okay. (Clears throat) Years ago, when I was backpacking across Western Europe…

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: You were backpacking across Western Europe?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Have a nice six more months Ross! (Starts to leave.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Okay! Okay! Okay. I’m sorry. Please, please, you were in Western Europe and?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I was just outside Barcelona hiking in the foothills of Mount Tibidabo. I was at the end of this path and I came to a clearing and there was a lake, very secluded. And there were tall trees all around. (Whispering) It was dead silent. Gorgeous. (Softly) And across the lake I saw…a beautiful woman…bathing herself…but she was crying…

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Why?

content.description: Ross’s Apartment, Ross is on his date with Kristen and they’re drinking wine.

content.speaker: Kristen
content.text: Umm, this is great wine.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: It’s from France…In Europe…Western Europe. Y’know umm, a few years ago I actually was backpacking across Western Europe.

content.speaker: Kristen
content.text: Really?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Uh-hmm—Wait! It gets better. Um, yeah I was in Barcelona.

content.speaker: Kristen
content.text: I studied for a year in Barcelona. (Ross is stunned and worried.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Anyway, umm so I was um, I was hiking…

content.speaker: Kristen
content.text: I love hiking!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh that’s great! I was hiking along the foothills of Mount Tibidaybo…

content.speaker: Kristen
content.text: I think its Tibidabo.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Okay! Do you wanna tell the story?!

content.description: Joey and Rachel’s, Joey is standing at the counter as Ross enters.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Whoa! What are you doing here? How did your date go?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Great! I’m across the street having sex with her right now. Your story sucks!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Hey! Look, if it didn’t work it’s because you didn’t tell it right! Show me how you did it.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No! No, I don’t…don’t want to.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: How long since you’ve seen a girl naked?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I was backpacking across Western Europe.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I’m not feeling it.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I was just outside Barcelona, hiking…

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: No! No! No Ross! I’m not hot! Are you hot?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: It’s been six months! I’m always hot!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Well you’re not selling the story! It’s like; it’s like you don’t believe it! Look, I gotta go. I got a date, but try this. Do what I do when I’m preparing for an audition. Okay? I’ll set you up with my video camera and you can record yourself and-and see what you’re doing wrong.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I’ll try that.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: All right now… All right, you’re all set up. You’re good to go. Just hit record. All right?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Thanks.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Good luck.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Thanks. And-and hey Joe?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Yeah?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Listen, if you ever have any problem with the ladies you know I’ll help you out.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: That means a lot to me man. (Exits.)
(Ross pours himself a glass of wine, hits record, and sits down in front of the camera.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hello! Can I get you anything? Huh? Lens cleaner? Your battery okay? (Rachel bursts in carrying two boxes and Ross jumps up.) Rachel!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh Ross!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hi!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Thank God you’re here! You have to help me! Were you just talking to yourself?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: That’s less embarrassing, yes. Yes I was.
(They sit down on the couch, which is in front of the still recording camera.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: So when she came in, I got distracted and totally forgot about the camera. [Cut back to the present day.] It kept rolling and recorded everything.
(Pause)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Yeah, we’re gonna need to see that tape. (They rest of them agree.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Yeah, definitely.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What a great idea! That will get Rachel to forgive me!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Y’know what? This is not fair to her. Let’s just forget the tape!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Thank you. (Joey mouths to Ross, “You’ll show me right?”) No!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: You’re right. (Mouths, “I know you’ll show me, right?)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Joey! No!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Loud and clear! (Mouths, “You’ll show me,” and nods.)
(Ross storms out.)

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, Monica, Chandler, Joey, and Phoebe are now sitting in the living room.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I still don’t get why Greg and Jenny would give us a fake number.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Y’know, if they knew what they were doing they probably didn’t give you real names either.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Okay, maybe people give out fake numbers, but they don’t give out fake names.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Oh yeah? (To Phoebe) Hi, Ken Adams, nice to meet you.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Regina Philange. (Ken and Regina shake hands.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I still don’t get it, we didn’t do anything wrong.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I know! Although, you did tell an awful lot of jokes.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: I thought you said those jokes were funny. Joke! Joke! Joke!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Joke. Joke. Blah! Blah! (Joey and Phoebe laugh.)
content.parenthetical: rolling her head from side to side

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Well maybe it was all of your questions.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: What about my questions?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: The sheer volume, it was like flying with the Riddler!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Oh, I’m sorry. Was that another joke?

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Was that another question?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Hey! Is Ross still here?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Uh no Rach, he’s gone. But listen, he told us what happened and it does, it sounds like an honest mistake.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh really? Well how would you like it if I had sex with you and I taped it? (Joey smiles luridly) Oh forget it! (Ross enters.) Oh there he is now, the father of my child, the porn king of the west village.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Look, it was accident! Okay? I-I feel bad that it happened, but I swear, I didn’t even watch it! Anyway, here. (He takes the tape out of his coat pocket.) I thought you might be more comfortable destroying it yourself. (Tosses her the tape.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Thank you. (She sets it on the floor and is about to stomp on it with her shoe when the rest of the gang jumps up and yells simultaneously.) What? (They all yell again.) You don’t want to see this do you?

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hell yeah!!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I am not gonna show you this!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: No! Not the sex part, just the stuff leading up to it.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Forget it, she’s destroying it.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Okay fine! Fine! We’ll just have to think of some other way to put the whole ‘Who came onto who,’ thing to rest! Come on now, think!!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Look, forget it Phoebe. Okay? It’s Rachel’s tape and she can do whatever she wants with it. And she wants to destroy it. So, end of story.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I wanna see it.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: What?!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Clearly you don’t want people to see this tape. Now I don’t want people to see this tape either, but you so badly don’t people to see it makes me want to see it. You see?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Are we watchin’ the tape or not?!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I don’t want people to see it for your sake.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ahh, I don’t believe you. I think you don’t want them to see you begging me. (Goes to put the tape in the VCR)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Rachel, please…

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ah, a little preview!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Fine. Fine, but I want the record to show that I tried to take the high road, because in about five minutes I’m gonna be saying…(He laughs and points at Rachel sarcastically.)
(They both sit down.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay, here we go. (Pushes play.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hello! Can I get you anything?

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: I’m so happy!

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, the scene is continued from earlier.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh, thank God you’re here! You have to help me! Were you just talking to yourself?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: There I am.

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: You’re gonna get pregnant.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I screwed up so bad, I told Monica that I would stuff and send all these wedding invitations like weeks ago and I-I…

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: You didn’t do it?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I-I know—I had put them in…in-in my desk at work and I completely forgot about them until today.
(Chandler is shocked and Rachel gets scared of Monica very quickly.)

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Sweetie okay. It’s okay. Everybody made it to the wedding. I’m fine.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Kinda hurtin’ my hand though.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: I know.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: (Ross hands her a glass of wine) I cannot believe that I did this. Especially after Monica just went on and on and on about it! (Mimicking Monica) “Okay Rachel! Here are the invitations Rachel! Now be very careful Rachel! Please, drinking no liquids around the invitations Rachel!” (She tilts her wine glass above and moves it back and forth across the invitations) Whoa oh! Oh-oh-oh! Oh…oh-oh-oh…
(Rachel hits fast forward. Monica is completely shocked.)

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Did you do it on our invitations?!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Not on the ones we sent out.

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: So, just the ones gave back to us and we had framed! (Slams the framed invitation down onto the table.)
(Rachel stops fast forwarding.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Can you believe this is already happening? I mean it seems like yesterday they just got engaged.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I know. Hey remember…remember the night they got engaged? How uh, you and I almost…

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh, I remember how we almost. Do you think we would’ve gone through with it? Y’know, if we hadn’t gotten caught. Do you think we would’ve done it?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I mean I…I know I wanted to. I just, I just wasn’t sure if you wanted to.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh I wanted to.
(Ross and Rachel trade looks while watching the tape.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: So we…we both wanted to.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Interesting.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Yeah. (Pause) Anyway umm, it probably worked out for the best.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh yeah, sure.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay, in about ten seconds you’re gonna see him kiss me.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: And in about five seconds you’re gonna see why.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Ross did I ever tell you about the time that I went backpacking through Western Europe?
(Joey’s shocked and everyone else looks at Rachel.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Okay, get ready to see some beggin’!

content.speaker: Phoebe
content.text: Oh, you came on to Ross!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What?!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Now I’m so happy.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: What are you talking about?!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: You used the Europe story!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: That’s the magic story you use when you wanna have sex!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: How do you know about that story?!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: How do you know about that story?!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: I heard it from my friend Irene who heard it from some guy!

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Some guy!! (Points to himself.)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: No. No, she told me his name was Ken Adams.

content.speaker: Joey
content.text: Ken Adams!!
content.parenthetical: raises his hand and points to himself again

content.description: Joey and Rachel’s, Rachel is looking at the tape sitting on the counter as Ross enters.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hi.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: So uh, apparently people are familiar with the Europe story?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Yeah. Listen about that, the whole uh, who came on to who thing really doesn’t matter. I mean, I think it would’ve happened either way. I mean if you hadn’t initiated it I-I-I know I would’ve.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: It was an amazing night.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: It was. It was an amazing night.
(Pause)

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: You think it looked amazing?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I uh… I don’t know. I mean I…I honestly didn’t watch it.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Yeah, me neither. Yet…

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Uhhhhhh…that-that may be weird.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Yeah, it would be really weird.
(Ross grabs the tape and heads for the VCR as Rachel goes over and puts the chain on the door and locks it.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Good luck.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Good luck to you.
(Ross pushes play.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Mind if I mute?

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh please. (He does so.)

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh, oh there go the clothes.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: You are undressing very quickly.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Six months Rachel, six months.

content.speaker: Ross and Rachel
content.text: Ah. (Pause) Oh.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Hey. We-we look…we look pretty good.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: That’s what I was gonna say.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh nice tan!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Thank you! I had just gone to the beach that weekend.

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Ah…

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Have you been working out?

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: I have been working out.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Really? Wow, this is so much better than I…

content.speaker: Ross and Rachel
content.text: Ohh! Ew!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh that’s not pretty.

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh! Oh!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh God!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh no!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Oh, make it stop!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: Oh no!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Make it stop!!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No!!

content.speaker: Rachel
content.text: Have to make it stop!!

content.speaker: Ross
content.text: No!!!
(They both get out of the chair and run for the VCR.)

content.description: Monica and Chandler’s, Monica and Chandler have gone through the phone book and found Greg and Jenny’s number which Monica has just dialed.

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hello Greg? (Listens) Hi, this is Monica from the plane? Listen, the number that you gave me 853-5… (Listens) (To Chandler) That is their old number! Jenny’s been giving it out since they moved!

content.speaker: Chandler
content.text: Jenny! That is so Jenny!

content.speaker: Monica
content.text: Hey listen umm, how would you like to get together? Say next Saturday? (Listens) Okay, how about Sunday? (Listens) Okay umm, the week after that? (Listens) The week after that? (Listens) Y’know what Greg? Y’know what? We are good, interesting, funny people with good questions and if you and your precious Jenny can’t see that then… (Listens) January 15 th ? (Chandler dances.) We’ll see you then! (Listens) Okay!
(She hangs up the phone and they hug.)
